name: Zei's Stone of Vengeance
flavorText: Legend says this gem was crafted by Zei to torment fleeing enemies. Other legends claim that Zei never existed.
flavorTextHtml: Legend says this gem was crafted by Zei to torment fleeing enemies. Other legends claim that Zei never existed.

secondary.textHtml: Damage you deal is increased by 4.00% for every 10 yards between you and the enemy hit. Maximum 20.00% increase at 50 yards. 4.00%
secondary.text: Damage you deal is increased by 4.00% for every 10 yards between you and the enemy hit. Maximum 20.00% increase at 50 yards. 4.00%
